heading: Photography - All about capturing light
description: Capturing the originality of whatever appeasing to your eyes.

heading: Grid - Get a level frame
description: Turn on the grid to get a level frame, control light and very useful showing composition techniques like rule of thirds (will discuss later).

heading: HDR - High dynamic range
description: Camera captures an image multiple times in rapid succession at various brightness level. And the final combination of that image is HDR.
